reference.title: apiOperation
reference.shortdesc: The <apiOperation> element specifies a collection of features, such as attributes, methods, values, and operations.

section.title: Description
section.p: This element requires an ID attribute as an anchor point. This ID is the target for references by <link> or <xref> elements (conref and keyref attributes), and for other internal specialization elements that refer to this <apiRef> content. Use a unique key such as fully qualified package name for the named API reference.
